sentences.en: A civet Arctictis binturong of southeast Asia with a long, prehensile tail.
sentences.cn: 熊狸,香猫产于东南亚的香猫(北极熊狸),有易于缠绕的长尾巴.

sentences.en: A monkey has a prehensile tail.
sentences.cn: 猴子有能盘卷住东西的尾巴.

sentences.en: Buy a bridle , north city NaShi prehensile bullwhip buy.
sentences.cn: 南市买辔头, 北市买长鞭.

sentences.en: Only the kinkajou's tail is prehensile, like a monkey's, and only the kinkajou has been a pet for Paris Hilton.
sentences.cn: 二者仅有的不同点在于蜜熊的尾巴像猴子一样可以用来抓握，而且还曾被帕里斯·希尔顿拿来当宠物养。

sentences.en: Poets are those strangely prehensile men.
sentences.cn: 诗人是那些具有深刻洞察力的人们.
猴子能缠住东西的尾巴

sentences.en: The savanna browsing black rhino has a prehensile lip for feeding on shrubs.
sentences.cn: 热带大草原的啮草黑犀牛有能卷握东西的嘴唇,可以用于吸食灌木的嫩枝叶.

sentences.en: They have prehensile lips for feeding on leaves and saplings.
sentences.cn: 它们都具有能卷握东西的嘴唇,可用于取食树叶和树苗.

trans.tran_en: a prehensile tail, foot etc can curl around things and hold on to them
